title: Statistical Sampling and Evidence-Based Argumentation: Collaborative Learning for Real-World Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Targets learners in economically vulnerable environments, enabling resource collection and collaborative learning via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can construct data-driven arguments about social issues by utilizing sampling methods
Learners can enhance their argumentation skills for solving real-life problems by using survey data rather than personal opinions
Learners can explain how collected data supports their arguments by applying sampling concepts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
